extension.news: 1.0.13 - Fix SBT live channel - Fix Canais Globo live DRM issue 1.0.12 - Removed python locale dependency to avoid translations issues 1.0.11 - Implemented video excerpts for Globoplay - Fix Globo affiliated without epg were being hidden 1.0.10 - Fix Telecine Play Oi Login 1.0.9 - Implemented Pluto TV Live and VOD - TNT search 1.0.8 - Huge performance gain when rendering items using Kodi >17 (ListItem offscreen) - Workaround to fix Dash playback from Globoplay and Canais Globo that was not working using only inputstream.adaptive - Implemented SBT live channel - Better support (using the new internal proxy server) for TNT Play streams 1.0.7 - Support for Globoplay mais canais ao vivo 1.0.6 - Fix globoplay navigation issues for some content types 1.0.5 - Fix live channels player issues - Implemented optional channel authorization check to allow hide channels not playable - Changes to live channels display information 1.0.4 - Implemented Now Online search
